mapper: select houseNumber, houseContent, houseMessage, houseAddress, houseAddressDetail, houseLocation, memberId, houseDeposit, houseMonth, houseType, houseGender, houseManagement, houseTotalFloor, houseFloor, houseWay, houseLoan, houseParking, housePet, houseElevator, houseDate, maPowerRates, maGas, maWater, maInternet, maTv, opAircon, opRefrigerator, opWasher, opGasrange, opInduction, opMicrowave, opDesk, opDoorlock, opBed, opCloset, opShoes, opSink from tbl_house where houseNumber = #{houseNumber};
